org.doctester.testbrowser

Class PayloadUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctester.testbrowser.PayloadUtils

  • public class PayloadUtils
extends Object
    Provides some utility methods for HTTP request/response payload type detection and pretty-printing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PayloadUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isContentTypeApplicationJson(Map<String,String> headers)
      Checks whether the headers define the content type to be JSON.
      static boolean isContentTypeApplicationXml(Map<String,String> headers)
      Checks whether the headers define the content type to be XML.
      static String prettyPrintRequestPayload(Object payload, Map<String,String> headers)
      Attempts to pretty print the payload of an HTTP request based on the headers.
      static String prettyPrintResponsePayload(String payload, Map<String,String> headers)
      Attempts to pretty print the payload of an HTTP response based on the headers.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PayloadUtils

        public PayloadUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • prettyPrintRequestPayload

        public static String prettyPrintRequestPayload(Object payload,
                                               Map<String,String> headers)
                                        throws IOException
        Attempts to pretty print the payload of an HTTP request based on the headers. Only JSON and XML are supported at the moment.
        Parameters:
        payload - Payload to be serialized in the request
        headers - Headers, should contain "Content-Type"
        Returns:
        Pretty printed payload
        Throws:
        IOException - If something went wrong when serializing the object

      • prettyPrintResponsePayload

        public static String prettyPrintResponsePayload(String payload,
                                                Map<String,String> headers)
                                         throws IOException
        Attempts to pretty print the payload of an HTTP response based on the headers. Only JSON is supported at the moment (XML is not because its tree model cannot be read without proper target class information).
        Parameters:
        payload - Payload to be pretty printed
        headers - Headers, should contain "Content-Type"
        Returns:
        Pretty printed payload
        Throws:
        IOException - If something went wrong when (de)serializing

      • isContentTypeApplicationJson

        public static boolean isContentTypeApplicationJson(Map<String,String> headers)
        Checks whether the headers define the content type to be JSON.
        Parameters:
        headers - Headers of a request or response
        Returns:
        true if content-type is JSON

      • isContentTypeApplicationXml

        public static boolean isContentTypeApplicationXml(Map<String,String> headers)
        Checks whether the headers define the content type to be XML.
        Parameters:
        headers - Headers of a request or response
        Returns:
        true if content-type is XML
